<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Cut from the Air](/Feats.aspx?ID=1729) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Fighter" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=71" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 127 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Trigger**
You are the target of a physical ranged Strike.

**Requirements**
You're aware of the attack, not [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) against it, and either have a hand free or are wielding a melee weapon.

</column>

---

You can knock aside ranged attacks. You gain a +4 circumstance bonus to AC against the triggering attack. If the attack misses, you knocked or cut it out of the air.

<title level="2">Cut from the Air leads to...</title>
[Smash from the Air](/Feats.aspx?ID=1731)
